item.title: Run MongoDB with Custom RBAC resources
item.description: New to KubeDB? Please start here. Using Custom RBAC resources KubeDB (version 0.13.0 and higher) supports finer user control over role based access permissions provided to a MongoDB instance. This tutorial will show you how to use KubeDB to run MongoDB instance with custom RBAC resources. Before You Begin At first, you need to have a Kubernetes cluster, and the kubectl command-line tool must be configured to communicate with your cluster.
